verb.comment: Not a verb in MOST cases, perhaps a preposition

example.parse: ( (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 你)) (VP (ADVP (AD 随处)) (VP (VV 可) (VP (VV 见) (PU ――) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (PP-BNF (P 为) (NP (NN 大气))) (VP (VV 加上) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 该) (VP (VE 有))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 色彩))))))))) (PU …) (PU …)))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 不 该 有 的 色彩
